荍字的基本解释

荍
qiáo
锦葵，一种花草：“视尔如荍。”
古同“荞”，荞麦。

荍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiáo］
［《廣韻》渠遥切，平宵，羣。］
(1)即锦葵。二年生草本。初夏开花，生于叶腋；花冠淡紫色，可供观赏。
(2)同“蕎”

荍字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　荍； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1031第03
【唐韻】渠遙切【集韻】【正韻】祁堯切，?音翹。【詩·陳風】視爾如荍。【傳】荍，芘芣也。【疏】一名蚍?。陸疏：似蕪菁，華紫綠色，可食，微苦。【爾雅翼】一名錦葵花。　又【爾雅註】今荆葵也又云荍，小草，多花少葉，葉又翹起。又【類篇】尸周切，音收。【集韻】巨夭切，音趫。義?同。

考證：〔【詩·陳風】視爾如荍。【傳】，荍芘芣也。【疏】一名蚍?。郭註，今荆葵也。陸註，似蕪菁，華紫綠色，可食，微苦。【爾雅翼】一名錦葵花。　又【爾雅註】荍，小草。〕　謹按郭註乃爾雅註非毛詩註。謹將郭註至陸註八字改陸疏二字。爾雅註下增今荆葵也又云六字。
荍字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
荍字的起名意思

荞的异体字；古书上指"锦葵"，两年生或多年生草本，夏季开白花或紫色花，可供观赏。

Xun
Basic explanation of words
Xun
qiáo
Mallow, a kind of flower: "As you look at it, it's like a nun."
Ancient Tong "buckwheat", buckwheat.
Xun
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiáo］
["Guang Yun" Qu Yao cut, flat night, group. ]
(1) Mallow. Biennial herb. It blooms in early summer and is born in the leaf axils; the corolla is lavender and can be viewed.
(2) Same as "buckwheat"
Xun
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Chinese Characters] 　荍; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1031 Page 03
[Tang Yun] Qu Yao cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Qi Yao cut,? Yin Qiao. 【Poetry·Chen Feng】Seeing you as a mother. [Biography] Xun, pyrene also. [Sparse] A scorpion? Lu Shu: Turnip-like, purple-green, edible, slightly bitter. [Er Ya Wing] A mallow flower.　[Erya Note] Nowadays, the wattle is also clouded, small grass, more flowers and less leaves, and the leaves are up again. Also 【Classes】The corpse is cut around, and the sound is collected. [Jiyun] Juyao cuts, and the sound turns. Righteous? Same. Textual research: [[Poetry·Chen Feng] Seeing you as a bird. [Biography], Xun Fu pyrene also. [Sparse] A scorpion? Guo Note, Jingkui is also today. Lu Zhu, like turnips, purple-green, edible, slightly bitter. [Er Ya Wing] A mallow flower.　[Erya Note] Xun, Xiaocao. 〕　I would like to follow Guo Zhunai Erya's non-Mao poem note. I would like to change the characters from Guo Zhu to Lu Zhu to Lu Shu. Erya's bet adds Jinkui to the six characters.
Xun

Old glyph
Xun
Name meaning
A variant of buckwheat; in ancient books, it refers to "mallow", a biennial or perennial herb that blooms white or purple flowers in summer for viewing.
qiáo
сущ.
1) * дикая мальва
视尔如荍 смотрю на тебя, как на мальвы цветок
2) вм. 荞 (гречиха)
